main event: The observer sighted a blinking white light that traveled north and disappeared in a matter of seconds.
interesting points: The object was moving very fast at a tremendous speed, at first the observer thought it might be a shooting star.
The object moved across the sky in a rather zig-zag motion and was larger than any shooting star the observer had ever seen.
The object suddenly stopped and remained stationary for a few seconds, then it suddenly took off again in a different direction at an incredibly high speed.
The object seemed to be emitting its own light and was not reflecting light.
The observer's wife also witnessed the object in the sky and confirmed what the observer saw.
